newsitem.title: USA: 3-D Geophysical gets $6.5 mln Pemex work.
newsitem.headline: 3-D Geophysical gets $6.5 mln Pemex work.

text.p: 3-D Geophysical Inc said Friday its Mexican subsidiary, Geoevaluaciones SA de CV, has been awarded a contract for a new 3-D seismic data acquisition project and related data processing with a value of $6.5 million by the Mexican national oil company, Pemex-Exploracion Y Produccion.

The Copite project will survey the state of Veracruz in central Mexico. 3-D said the hilly terrain will require partial helicopter utilization. Project work is expected to start approximately June 1 and take about nine months to complete, including data processing.
The contract provides for payment in pesos and has partial exchange rate and inflation protection.
